intro: Ceropegia burchelliana, commonly known as the string of hearts, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its trailing growth habit and distinctive heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, tubular flowers that are typically pale green or yellowish in color. It thrives in well-draining soil and requires bright, indirect light to flourish. Ceropegia burchelliana is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental foliage and ease of care.
